name: BEFORE TOMORROW
description:
What happens before you fall asleep? What world do you travel through? Do you make any choices or are you guided? 

Do you ever get stuck in a place you do not want to be? 

And...who do you hurt when the slumber does not fall upon you? 

This is a very short walking simulator through the world that exists before you fall asleep. The world which you experience every day. This time it has altered itself just ever so slightly.
